name: Magic Pellets
description:
Match magic pellets to solve puzzles and discover new magical powers.

Embark on a magical journey with little Arthur and his mentor. Help Arthur discover and master his magic skills. Swap and match magic pellets to advance through exciting levels which new challenges.

Features:
Multiple game goals: Target scores, Timed levels, Collect items, Clear clouds, etc
Match magic pellets to create special pellets like rainbow pellets and blaster pellets
Use magical powers like invisible hat to move pellets anyway you want
Light weight game
30 levels
